text: i'm telling you, this business is brutal. to this day, i hate going on auditions. okay, i walk in, and i can just feel them thinking, he was such a cute kid, what happened to him? and then i don't get the job, and i can never find out why. honestly, i get so depressed, there are entire weeks that i can't even get out of bed.
